info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the OpenAPI specification for your project.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics for admin dashboard

post.description: Request a password reset link via email
Authenticate user with Google OAuth token
Authenticate user with email/phone and password
Get a new access token using a refresh token

get.description: Retrieve a specific professional's profile by ID
Retrieve paginated list of professionals with optional filters
Retrieve the authenticated professional's profile information
Retrieve statistics for a specific professional

post.description: Create a professional profile for the authenticated user

schema.$ref: #/components/schemas/Only clients and professionals can create a professional profile

get.description: Retrieve a single profession by its ID
Retrieve paginated list of professions with optional search filter

delete.description: Delete a profession by its ID

post.description: Create a new service offer for a posting

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of service postings with optional filters
Retrieve a single professional service by ID
Retrieve paginated list of professional services with optional filters

post.description: Create a service transaction directly from a professional service
Create a new review for a service transaction

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of reviews with optional filters
Retrieve a single service transaction by its ID. Users can only see their own transactions.
Retrieve paginated list of service transactions with optional filters. Users can only see their own transactions.

post.description: Accept a service offer and create a service transaction
Mark a service transaction as completed and process payment

put.description: Update the status of a service transaction

post.description: Generate and send OTP code to user's phone number
Verify user identity with cedula and facial recognition
Verify OTP code sent to phone number

get.description: Retrieve a specific user's profile by ID
Retrieve paginated list of users with optional filters
Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve a specific withdrawal's details by ID
Retrieve paginated list of withdrawals with optional filters

put.description: Update withdrawal status and admin notes
